      static AsyncGroup Core.$(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler, Async<?>... asyncs)

      void Async.awaitError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      the method would block current thread until async task finished or thrown with an exception, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      void AsyncGroup.onError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
      Handle exceptions that callback function thrown.
      if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      Otherwise, the process would be taken at callback thread when exception occurred.
      void Async.onError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      Otherwise, the process would be taken at async thread when exception occurred.
      use Async.awaitError(VFunc1) if you need to force the handling process taken on current thread.
